attributes.action: please stop patronising us with thie e-petition's thing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Does anyone really think the Government listen to this?  It is just a pathetic piece of spin to make it look like we can make a difference.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
